examples: It is interesting to compare their situation and ours.
Es interesante comparar su situación con la nuestra.
We compared the two reports carefully.
The internet allows you to compare prices from a variety of companies.
Internet le permite comparar precios de una variedad de empresas.
How can you compare the two things? They are so different!
¿Cómo puedes comparar las dos cosas? ¡Son tan diferentes!
